Detailed Description

Defines an interface for an item, which can contain a variable number of other items. An item-container can be used for describing e. g. a menu hierarchy.
See also:
ItemMenu

ItemTree

ItemGrid

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
 

Enumerator:
ID 

Reimplemented from Item.

enum AbstractItemContainer::AbstractItemContainerPropertyId
 

Enumerator:
ItemPropertyId  When a property of an item has been changed, the message ItemPropertiesChanged will be send to the dispatcher, which is assigned to the item. The message contains a property-index, which indicates the changed property or property-group. The property-indices 0 to 999 are reserved for APOXI. Additional defined ids:
  • 5: FeatureItem::FeaturePropertyId
RendererPropertyId 

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AbstractItemContainer::AbstractItemContainer (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

AbstractItemContainer::AbstractItemContainer (  Dispatcher *  dispatcher,
const WCHAR *  text,
const BitmapRes *  icon = 0,
BOOLEAN  enabled = TRUE
) 
 

Parameters:
dispatcher Dispatcher which will be informed about property changes of the item container. Usually the control which embeds the item container (e. g. ItemMenu, ItemTree or ItemGrid) is the dispatcher.
text Text of the item. The GUI-component using the item decides whether the text will be shown.
icon Icon of the item. The GUI-component using the item decides whether the icon will be shown.
enabled Sets the enabled-property. The GUI-component using the item usually indicates the enabled-property by a different look of the text.

Member Function Documentation

virtual BOOLEAN AbstractItemContainer::AddItem (  Item *  item  )  [pure virtual]
 

Adds the item item after the already added items. NotifyPropertyChanged(ItemPropertyId) should be invoked if the operation has been successful.

Implemented in FeatureItemContainer, ProviderProxyContainer, and ItemContainer.

BOOLEAN AbstractItemContainer::ContainsItem (  const Item &  item  )  const
 

Returns TRUE, if the item item is part of the item-container. Is a wrapper-method which uses AbstractItemContainer::GetItemIndex to check whether the item is part of the item-container.

virtual Item* AbstractItemContainer::GetItem (  INT  index  )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns the item of the index index.

Implemented in FeatureItemContainer, and ItemContainer.

virtual INT AbstractItemContainer::GetItemCount (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns the number of items of the item-grid.

Implemented in FeatureItemContainer, and ItemContainer.

virtual INT AbstractItemContainer::GetItemIndex (  const Item &  item  )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns the index of the item item. If the item is not part of the item-grid, -1 is returned.

Implemented in FeatureItemContainer, and ItemContainer.

virtual AbstractItemContainer* AbstractItemContainer::GetParentContainer (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Returns the parent container.

Implemented in ProviderProxyContainer, and ItemContainer.

const ItemRendererProperties * AbstractItemContainer::GetRendererProperties (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to the item renderer properties, which should be used for rendering the items inside the item container. Per default 0 is returned.

Reimplemented in ItemContainer.

Item *  item
)  [pure virtual]
 

Inserts the item item at the index index NotifyPropertyChanged(ItemPropertyId) should be invoked if the operation has been successful.

virtual BOOLEAN AbstractItemContainer::RemoveAllItems (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Removes all items. NotifyPropertyChanged(ItemPropertyId) should be invoked if the operation has been successful.

Implemented in FeatureItemContainer, ProviderProxyContainer, and ItemContainer.

virtual BOOLEAN AbstractItemContainer::RemoveItem (  INT  index  )  [pure virtual]
 

Removes the item item at the index index. NotifyPropertyChanged(ItemPropertyId) should be invoked if the operation has been successful.

Implemented in FeatureItemContainer, ProviderProxyContainer, and ItemContainer.

virtual BOOLEAN AbstractItemContainer::SetParentContainer (  AbstractItemContainer *  container  )  [pure virtual]
 

Sets the parent container. FALSE is returned, if the setting of a parent-container is not supported or has been failed.

Implemented in ProviderProxyContainer, and ItemContainer.

BOOLEAN AbstractItemContainer::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id,
UINT16  object_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.

Reimplemented from Item.

Reimplemented in FeatureItemContainer, and ItemContainer.

BOOLEAN AbstractItemContainer::SetRendererProperties (  const ItemRendererProperties *  properties  )  [virtual]
 

Sets the item renderer properties, which should be used for rendering the items inside the item container. FALSE is returned, if the setting of item renderer properties is not supported or has been failed. Per default FALSE is returned.

Reimplemented in ItemContainer.
